metadata.creator: Atlantic Records
metadata.description:
"Barbie - The Album (2023) [24Bit-48kHz] FLAC" is a soundtrack album associated with the 2023 film "Barbie," directed by Greta Gerwig. The album was released on the same day as the film's North American theatrical release, July 21, 2023, by Atlantic Records. It features a variety of artists and a mix of genres like pop, rock, and ballads, aiming to capture the essence of each scene in the film. 

The album has been described as having a star-studded tracklist with contributions from notable artists such as Nicki Minaj, Lizzo, Dua Lipa, Billie Eilish, and others, reflecting a diverse range of musical styles. Some of the tracks included are "Pink" by Lizzo, "Dance The Night" by Dua Lipa, "Barbie World" (with Aqua) by Nicki Minaj & Ice Spice, and "Speed Drive" by Charli XCX, among others. 

The format quality of the album is highlighted as FLAC (Free Lossless Audio Codec) with a 24-bit depth and a sampling rate of 48000 Hz, which assures a high-fidelity audio playback that is much closer to the original recording quality.
